courseInfo.title: Inheritance in Java
courseInfo.subtitle: Comprehensive course on inheritance in java

content.introduction: In this lesson, we'll explore inheritance in java and its key concepts.

points.subtitle: Inheritance allows classes to inherit attributes a...
points.content: Inheritance allows classes to inherit attributes and methods from a parent class (superclass).

points.subtitle: Method overriding enables subclasses to provide sp...
points.content: Method overriding enables subclasses to provide specific implementations for methods defined in the superclass.

points.subtitle: Using 'super' keyword to call the superclass const...
points.content: Using 'super' keyword to call the superclass constructor.

points.subtitle: Creating a Cat class that inherits from Dog and ov...
points.content: Creating a Cat class that inherits from Dog and overrides the 'speak' method.

points.subtitle: Using 'super' in the Cat constructor to initialize...
points.content: Using 'super' in the Cat constructor to initialize inherited attributes.

content.conclusion: You've now learned about inheritance in java. Practice these concepts to reinforce your understanding.

quizzes.question: What keyword is used to inherit from a superclass in Java?
quizzes.answer: Correct answer will be determined based on content
quizzes.explanation: This question tests your understanding of inheritance in java.

quizzes.question: What is the difference between static and instance variables?
quizzes.answer: Correct answer will be determined based on content
quizzes.explanation: This question tests your understanding of inheritance in java.

quizzes.question: Why would you override the 'equals' method in a class?
quizzes.answer: Correct answer will be determined based on content
quizzes.explanation: This question tests your understanding of inheritance in java.
